Title: Prohibits the placement and operation of wireless communication facilities upon school property
Summary: Prohibits wireless communication facilities on school property; provides that a school may not negotiate for or enter into a contract for the placement or operation of any wireless communication facility on school property and schools with wireless communication facilities already on school property are allotted 180 days to terminate any contracts and remove the towers off the property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the placement and operation of wireless communication facilities on school property
